..\\traits\\trait_id.json.title: Globally Unique ID trait
..\\traits\\trait_id.json.description: A globally unique identifier of the content in the ANS repository.

..\\traits\\trait_subtype.json.title: Subtype trait
..\\traits\\trait_subtype.json.description: A more granular type than story, gallery, etc. (E.g., column, blog_post)

..\\traits\\trait_channel.json.title: Channel trait
..\\traits\\trait_channel.json.description: An optional list of output types for which this element should be visible

..\\traits\\trait_additional_properties..title: Has additional properties
..\\traits\\trait_additional_properties..description: A grab-bag object for non-validatable data.
